description:
Fans of The Magicians TV series can add it to their Blu-ray collection for cheap thanks to a steep discount on The Magicians: The Complete Series over at Amazon. You’ll also find a few deals on books that inspired the show, plus price cuts on comics and other novels by The Magicians author Lev Grossman.

The Magicians: The Complete Se
title: Relive The Magicians TV Series With These Blu-Ray And Book Deals

description:
Space Marine 2 is off to a tremendous start. Not only has it reviewed well, but it shattered Warhammer's franchise record for concurrent players on launch day and became Focus Entertainment's fastest-selling game. Long-time Warhammer-heads will feel right at home donning the blue armor of the Ultramarines chapter, but given its current popularity, plenty of newcomers are jumping into the series for the first time with Space Marine 2. And if you wind up loving the world of Warhammer, there's good news: Warhammer 40K has a massive library of video games, books, and tabletop miniatures to explore.

On the other hand, all that content can be intimidating to newcomers--there are hundreds of novels, dozens of games, and nearly four decades of tabletop lore to catch up on. Luckily, there are some clear entry points into the Wa
title: Warhammer 40,000 - Where To Start With Video Games, Books, And Tabletop

description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the Grimdark weaponry of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, including the Bolt Rifle, Bolt Sniper Rifle, Bolt Carbine, and Auto Bolt Rifle. Lots of bolters, basically.
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2's Guns
